contest-event.event-date: March 19, 1983 D Midlands Area (Youth Section) Midlands Area (Youth Section) 50 Test Piece Contest Midlands Area midlands-area-youth-section National Youth Brass Band Championships From 1985 to 1993 this contest was split into North and South Areas. Please refer to the 'Old Contests' section on http://brassbandresults.co.uk/contests/MIDLANDS-AREA/ for the results. Midlands Youth Rhapsody on Negro Spirituals Queens Hall, Wyggeston Collegiate School May 11, 2011, 8:40 a.m. May 12, 2011, 10:12 a.m. 1 Loughborough Youth Band Bud Fisher 2 Northamptonshire Youth John Berryman 3 Corby Beanfield School Donald Manning 4 Ratby Co-operative Youth D. Woodward
